#summary Checking out the examples
#labels Featured

Currently their are two samples which are used to showcase Impala.

 * [SamplesPetclinic Petclinic sample]: a version of the Spring Framework Petclinic application, adapted for Impala. Features Hibernate and Spring MVC.
 * [SamplesWebframework Web frameworks sample]: a sample demonstrating integration with popular Java web frameworks, Struts, Tapestry and Wicket.
 * [SamplesExample Examples sample]: a testbed for Impala features, designed more for Impala developers rather than users.
 * [SamplesOSGi OSGi sample]: a testbed for Impala's OSGi support.
